greeting.name: Hi, my name is Truong Tien Dat
greeting.information: Experienced .NET Developer with almost 2 years of expertise in building scalable web applications. Proficient in C#, ASP.NET, Postgresql, MySQL. Strong problem-solving skills with a passion for clean code and continuous learning.

tma.name: TMA Solutions
tma.title: Intern Backend Developer
tma.information:
Learned about software development and maintained web applications using ASP.NET Core and Angular.
Implemented RESTful APIs using ASP.NET Core Web API and responsive frontend with Angular Framework.
Optimized database queries for improved performance.

idb.name: IDB Corporation
idb.title: .NET Developer
idb.information:
Developed and maintained Autocall applications using ASP.NET Core and Asterisk.
Implemented business logic, data access layers.
Collaborated with QA team to ensure code quality.
Participated in Agile development process.

squareOne.name: SquareOne Soft
squareOne.title: .NET Developer
squareOne.information:
Developed and maintained scalable web applications using ASP.NET Core, focusing on admin dashboards and user interfaces.
Implemented RabbitMQ for efficient message queuing and Redis for caching frequently accessed data to enhance performance.
Collaborated with the QA team to ensure high code quality and participated in the Agile development process to deliver accurate software solutions.
Acted as a proactive team member, fostering collaboration between developers and testers to meet project deadlines and maintain high-quality standards.

myBlog.name: My Blog
myBlog.description: Develop a RESTful web API that allows users to register, authenticate, upload blog posts with rich text and images, edit or delete their content, and categorize posts by tags or topics. Includes user profile management and admin moderation features.
myBlog.technologies: ASP.NET Framework, C#, Redis, RabbitMQ, Docker

youShop.name: You Shop
youShop.description: An e-commerce platform designed for small to mid-size businesses to showcase and sell products online. Features include product listings, shopping cart, secure checkout, order tracking, user reviews, and an admin dashboard for inventory and order management.

tooltips.email: Send an email to truongdat2232@gmail.com, or double click to copy the email
